```ts
// åç«¯å¤„ç†æµç¨‹ï¼ˆlib/providers/deepseek.tsï¼‰
export class DeepSeekProvider implements ChatProvider {
  async stream(messages: Message[]): AsyncGenerator<ChatCompletionChunk> {
    const response = await fetch('https://api.deepseek.com/v1/chat/completions', {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: {
        'Authorization': `Bearer ${process.env.DEEPSEEK_API_KEY}`,
        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
      },
      body: JSON.stringify({
        model: 'deepseek-chat',
        messages,
        stream: true
      })
    })

    const reader = response.body?.getReader()
    const decoder = new TextDecoder()

    while (true) {
      const { done, value } = await reader!.read()
      if (done) break

      const chunk = decoder.decode(value)
      for (const line of chunk.split('\n')) {
        if (!line.startsWith('data:')) continue
        const json = JSON.parse(line.slice(5))
        if (json.choices[0]?.delta?.content) {
          // MCP æ’ä»¶ç›‘å¬ï¼šæ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å«æš´åŠ›è¯
          const filtered = await mcpFilter(json.choices[0].delta.content)
          yield { content: filtered, done: false }
        }
      }
    }

    yield { content: '', done: true }
  }
}
```

### ğŸ® ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼šå•†å“æœç´¢ + åˆ†é¢ç­›é€‰

#### åœºæ™¯ï¼š
ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨å•†åŸæœç´¢â€œiPhoneâ€ï¼Œç­›é€‰ä»·æ ¼åŒºé—´ 5000-8000ï¼Œå“ç‰Œä¸ºâ€œAppleâ€

#### è¯·æ±‚ï¼š
```http
GET /portal/search/list?keyword=iPhone&priceMin=5000&priceMax=8000&brandId=1&page=1&size=20
```

#### åç«¯å¤„ç†ï¼ˆmall-search æ¨¡å—ï¼‰ï¼š

```java
@Service
public class ProductSearchService {

    @Autowired
    private ElasticsearchRestTemplate elasticsearchTemplate;

    public SearchResult search(String keyword, Integer priceMin, Integer priceMax, Long brandId, int page, int size) {
        NativeSearchQuery query = new NativeSearchQueryBuilder()
            .withQuery(
                BoolQueryBuilder.builder()
                    .must(QueryBuilders.matchQuery("name", keyword))
                    .filter(QueryBuilders.rangeQuery("price").gte(priceMin).lte(priceMax))
                    .filter(QueryBuilders.termQuery("brandId", brandId))
                    .build()
            )
            .withPageable(PageRequest.of(page, size))
            .withAggregations(
                AggregationBuilders.terms("brands").field("brandId"),
                AggregationBuilders.range("priceRange").field("price")
                    .addRange(0, 1000).addRange(1000, 3000).addRange(3000, 5000).addRange(5000, 8000)
            )
            .build();

        SearchHits<Product> hits = elasticsearchTemplate.search(query, Product.class);
        
        return SearchResult.builder()
            .list(hits.get().map(SearchHit::getContent).collect(Collectors.toList()))
            .total(hits.getTotalHits())
            .aggregations(buildAggregationResult(hits.getAggregations()))
            .build();
    }
}
```

```python
# servers/jupyter/server.pyï¼ˆç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆï¼‰
import sys
import json
from pathlib import Path

def list_notebooks(path: str, sort_by="modified", limit=5):
    notebooks = sorted(
        Path(path).glob("*.ipynb"),
        key=lambda f: f.stat().st_mtime,
        reverse=True
    )[:limit]
    
    return {
        "notebooks": [
            {"name": n.name, "path": str(n), "modified": n.stat().st_mtime}
            for n in notebooks
        ]
    }

def main():
    while True:
        line = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
        if not line:
            break
            
        req = json.loads(line)
        method = req["method"]
        params = req.get("params", {})
        
        if method == "jupyter.list_notebooks":
            result = list_notebooks(**params)
            resp = {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "result": result, "id": req["id"]}
        else:
            resp = {
                "jsonrpc": "2.0",
                "error": {"code": -32601, "message": f"Method {method} not found"},
                "id": req.get("id")
            }
        
        print(json.dumps(resp), flush=True)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

```python
        Then click Submit.
        """,
        llm=llm,
        browser=browser,
        max_retries=3,  # è‡ªåŠ¨é‡è¯•å¤±è´¥æ“ä½œ
        timeout=60,     # æ€»ä»»åŠ¡è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´
    )

    # 4. æ‰§è¡Œå¹¶è·å–å†å²
    history = await agent.run()

    # 5. è¾“å‡ºç»“æœï¼ˆåŒ…å«æˆªå›¾ã€æ“ä½œæ—¥å¿—ã€æœ€ç»ˆé¡µé¢ HTMLï¼‰
    for step in history:
        print(f"[{step['action']}] {step.get('message', '')}")
    
    return history

if __name__ == "__main__":
    asyncio.run(fill_contact_form())
```
